transcript: what would you tell me if you knew I wouldn't get angry what would you tell me if you knew it wouldn't upset me and you get so much truthful feedback from people like hey you're really short or hey you're gble to communicate with or hey you take really long to respond or hey you tend to be late on meetings and it really pisses everyone off I would encourage you even maybe with your spouse to start but your team it's a really good exercise and you get some really good answers and a lot of times you get blind spots that you become made aware of and at least as far as I'm concerned I would rather people talk  to my face
